purpose: Toyota 5 Whys multi-causal root cause analysis
description: Toyota 5 Whys multi-causal root cause analysis system that applies systematic investigation methodology to identify underlying causes of problems, failures, or unexpected behaviors through structured evidence-based analysis.

problem-description.description: Description of the problem or issue to investigate

--systematic.details: Uses structured Toyota 5 Whys technique for root cause analysis

--evidence.details: Requires verifiable evidence for each level of analysis

--multi-causal.details: Explores multiple causal chains and interconnected factors

toyota_5_whys.why1: Direct symptom investigation - What is immediately observable?
toyota_5_whys.why2: Context analysis - Why does this condition exist?
toyota_5_whys.why3: System analysis - Why do these conditions persist?
toyota_5_whys.why4: Design analysis - Why wasn't this anticipated?
toyota_5_whys.why5: Root cause(s) - Why do these fundamental conditions exist?

evidence_requirements: Each WHY level must have verifiable evidence
Root causes must explain all symptoms collectively
Solutions must address all identified root causes
Backwards validation required from root cause to symptoms

examples.context: When investigating system failures requiring deep analysis
When investigating complex performance problems with multiple factors
